title: Bloomberg Markets: Lombardi Tells of her Bankruptcy Love Story
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Lombardi Tells of her Bankruptcy Love Story
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Janet Lombardi Discussing "Bankruptcy: A Love Story" her memoir of her family's plunge into economic turmoil and how she turned it all around. Oliver Renick of Bloomberg News also participates in the discussion.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
